summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation, authorizing acceptance of a $90,000 grant from the Seattle Housing Authority to support Youth Sports Programs at Yesler, Rainier, Van Asselt and High Point Community Centers; increasing the expenditure allowance in the Department's 1996 budget; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Park fund therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
